description.description: Community of lovers of Japanese animation.
rules:
<details><summary>Anime content only</summary><section>
**Anime content includes:**
• Coubs containing frames from anime series, films and animated clips created in Japan
• Cosplay and artwork on anime characters
• Direct visual references to the anime industry, defining the main thematic part of the coub

**Clarifications:**
• Anime works and films include only works produced in **Japan**. **Korean** and **Chinese** animations in a pronounced anime style are **allowed**.

• Memes, reactions, and individuals **cannot be direct references**.

**Other:**
The following series are **[cartoons](https://coub.com/community/cartoons)** and are **not related to anime**:
«Avatar: The Last Airbender»
«The Legend of Korra»
«Castlevania»
«The Boondocks»
«RWBY»
«Black Dynamite»</section></details>

<details><summary>Foreign content</summary><section>
**In the community is prohibited from posting:**
 
• Recoubs from only one coub
• Recoubs with minimal visual difference from the original
**•** Coubs that were cut from compilations and collections of coubs published on third-party services.

**We recommend that you avoid posting cubs cut from someone else’s video. For example:**
 
• Other people's videos from Instagram, Vine, Tik-Tok, AMV, etc.
• Compilations of jokes, funny voice acting, reviews and other entertainment content not owned by you</section></details>

<details><summary>NSFW content prohibited</summary><section>
The definition of NSFW content includes any content aimed at stimulating **erotic** rather than aesthetic emotional feelings, as well as content containing detailed scenes with **cruelty** and **violence**.</section></details>

<details><summary>Individual types of coubs</summary><section>
**Static coubs are prohibited**
A coub in which animation is completely or almost completely absent is static

**Coubs without sound are prohibited**
Be careful when adding music to coubs. It may be blocked by the copyright holder.

**Low quality coubs is prohibited.**
Low coub quality should be stylistically justified. Otherwise, it will be deleted.

**Animation in the coubs with animated artworks should be substantial.**
In coubs with animated artworks, must be animated an object , which is a direct reference to the anime industry.
• Non-essential animations include: stretching, tilting, rotating, and zooming the entire object.
• Animation of such small objects as: eyes, mouth, glare, etc. is also insignificant.

Coubs from the [**Living Photos**](https://coub.com/anime.living.photos) and [**Perfect Loop**](https://coub.com/anime.living.photos) genres are **allowed**.</section></details>

<details><summary>Tags</summary><section>
The presence of false tags that are not related to the content of the video may be the reason for the exclusion of the coub from the community.
  
In controversial* situations, the absence of a tag indicating the source material (anime name, character name) may be the basis for excluding a coub from the community.
  
**A controversial situation** is a situation in which it is impossible to immediately determine whether an object belongs to the anime industry.

**Non-significant animations include:**
Stretching, zooming, tilting, rotating, animation of small objects (eyes, mouth, small glare, etc.)</section></details>

<details><summary>Be nice</summary><section>
Offensive content and trolling are prohibited.
Respect the opinions and views of each other.</section></details>

<details><summary>Advertising is not welcome</summary><section>
Use [**promotion**](https://coub.com/promote) if you want to advertise something.
 
**Links** in the title and **calls** to go to third-party sites **are advertising**. Such content will be excluded from the community.
 
In isolated cases, advertising may be permitted by the [moderator](https://coub.com/frosty.q).</section></details>

<details><summary>Obey the terms</summary><section>
Publishing content that violates the user agreement is **strictly prohibited**.</section></details>

Korean and Chinese animations in a pronounced anime style are allowed.    • Memes, reactions, and individuals cannot be direct references.    Other:  The following series are cartoons and are not related to anime:  «Avatar: The Last Airbender»  «The Legend of Korra»  «Castlevania»  «The Boondocks»  «RWBY»  «Black Dynamite»

For example:    • Other people's videos from Instagram, Vine, Tik-Tok, AMV, etc.  • Compilations of jokes, funny voice acting, reviews and other entertainment content not owned by you

It may be blocked by the copyright holder.    Low quality coubs is prohibited.  Low coub quality should be stylistically justified. «Black Dynamite»</section></details>

• Recoubs with minimal visual difference from the original
**•** Coubs that were cut from compilations and collections of coubs published on third-party services.

**Coubs without sound are prohibited**

**Low quality coubs is prohibited.**
Low coub quality should be stylistically justified. Otherwise, it will be deleted.

**Animation in the coubs with animated artworks should be substantial.**
In coubs with animated artworks, must be animated an object , which is a direct reference to the anime industry.

• Animation of such small objects as: eyes, mouth, glare, etc. is also insignificant.

  Anime content includes:  • Coubs containing frames from anime series, films and animated clips created in Japan  • Cosplay and artwork on anime characters  • Direct visual references to the anime industry, defining the main thematic part of the coub    Clarifications:  • Anime works and films include only works produced in Japan. Korean and Chinese animations in a pronounced anime style are allowed.    • Memes, reactions, and individuals cannot be direct references.    Other:  The following series are cartoons and are not related to anime:  «Avatar: The Last Airbender»  «The Legend of Korra»  «Castlevania»  «The Boondocks»  «RWBY»  «Black Dynamite»

Foreign content

  In the community is prohibited from posting:    • Recoubs from only one coub  • Recoubs with minimal visual difference from the original  • Coubs that were cut from compilations and collections of coubs published on third-party services.    We recommend that you avoid posting cubs cut from someone else’s video. For example:    • Other people's videos from Instagram, Vine, Tik-Tok, AMV, etc.  • Compilations of jokes, funny voice acting, reviews and other entertainment content not owned by you

NSFW content prohibited

  The definition of NSFW content includes any content aimed at stimulating erotic rather than aesthetic emotional feelings, as well as content containing detailed scenes with cruelty and violence.

Individual types of coubs

  Static coubs are prohibited  A coub in which animation is completely or almost completely absent is static    Coubs without sound are prohibited  Be careful when adding music to coubs. It may be blocked by the copyright holder.    Low quality coubs is prohibited.  Low coub quality should be stylistically justified. Otherwise, it will be deleted.    Animation in the coubs with animated artworks should be substantial.  In coubs with animated artworks, must be animated an object , which is a direct reference to the anime industry.  • Non-essential animations include: stretching, tilting, rotating, and zooming the entire object.  • Animation of such small objects as: eyes, mouth, glare, etc. is also insignificant.    Coubs from the Living Photos and Perfect Loop genres are allowed.

Tags

  The presence of false tags that are not related to the content of the video may be the reason for the exclusion of the coub from the community.    In controversial* situations, the absence of a tag indicating the source material (anime name, character name) may be the basis for excluding a coub from the community.    A controversial situation is a situation in which it is impossible to immediately determine whether an object belongs to the anime industry.    Non-significant animations include:  Stretching, zooming, tilting, rotating, animation of small objects (eyes, mouth, small glare, etc.)

Be nice

  Offensive content and trolling are prohibited.  Respect the opinions and views of each other.

Advertising is not welcome

  Use promotion if you want to advertise something.    Links in the title and calls to go to third-party sites are advertising. Such content will be excluded from the community.    In isolated cases, advertising may be permitted by the moderator.

Obey the terms

  Publishing content that violates the user agreement is strictly prohibited.

rules:
<details><summary>Anime content only</summary><section>
**Anime content includes:**
• Coubs containing frames from anime series, films and animated clips created in Japan
• Cosplay and artwork on anime characters
• Direct visual references to the anime industry, defining the main thematic part of the coub

**Clarifications:**
• Anime works and films include only works produced in **Japan**. **Korean** and **Chinese** animations in a pronounced anime style are **allowed**.

• Memes, reactions, and individuals **cannot be direct references**.

**Other:**
The following series are **[cartoons](https://coub.com/community/cartoons)** and are **not related to anime**:
«Avatar: The Last Airbender»
«The Legend of Korra»
«Castlevania»
«The Boondocks»
«RWBY»
«Black Dynamite»</section></details>

<details><summary>Foreign content</summary><section>
**In the community is prohibited from posting:**
 
• Recoubs from only one coub
• Recoubs with minimal visual difference from the original
**•** Coubs that were cut from compilations and collections of coubs published on third-party services.

**We recommend that you avoid posting cubs cut from someone else’s video. For example:**
 
• Other people's videos from Instagram, Vine, Tik-Tok, AMV, etc.
• Compilations of jokes, funny voice acting, reviews and other entertainment content not owned by you</section></details>

<details><summary>NSFW content prohibited</summary><section>
The definition of NSFW content includes any content aimed at stimulating **erotic** rather than aesthetic emotional feelings, as well as content containing detailed scenes with **cruelty** and **violence**.</section></details>

<details><summary>Individual types of coubs</summary><section>
**Static coubs are prohibited**
A coub in which animation is completely or almost completely absent is static

**Coubs without sound are prohibited**
Be careful when adding music to coubs. It may be blocked by the copyright holder.

**Low quality coubs is prohibited.**
Low coub quality should be stylistically justified. Otherwise, it will be deleted.

**Animation in the coubs with animated artworks should be substantial.**
In coubs with animated artworks, must be animated an object , which is a direct reference to the anime industry.
• Non-essential animations include: stretching, tilting, rotating, and zooming the entire object.
• Animation of such small objects as: eyes, mouth, glare, etc. is also insignificant.

Coubs from the [**Living Photos**](https://coub.com/anime.living.photos) and [**Perfect Loop**](https://coub.com/anime.living.photos) genres are **allowed**.</section></details>

<details><summary>Tags</summary><section>
The presence of false tags that are not related to the content of the video may be the reason for the exclusion of the coub from the community.
  
In controversial* situations, the absence of a tag indicating the source material (anime name, character name) may be the basis for excluding a coub from the community.
  
**A controversial situation** is a situation in which it is impossible to immediately determine whether an object belongs to the anime industry.

**Non-significant animations include:**
Stretching, zooming, tilting, rotating, animation of small objects (eyes, mouth, small glare, etc.)</section></details>

<details><summary>Be nice</summary><section>
Offensive content and trolling are prohibited.
Respect the opinions and views of each other.</section></details>

<details><summary>Advertising is not welcome</summary><section>
Use [**promotion**](https://coub.com/promote) if you want to advertise something.
 
**Links** in the title and **calls** to go to third-party sites **are advertising**. Such content will be excluded from the community.
 
In isolated cases, advertising may be permitted by the [moderator](https://coub.com/frosty.q).</section></details>

<details><summary>Obey the terms</summary><section>
Publishing content that violates the user agreement is **strictly prohibited**.</section></details>
